statements: SELECT * FROM baseball_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM baseball_equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'Nike';
SELECT id, equipment_name FROM baseball_equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM baseball_equipment GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date FROM baseball_equipment WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC, maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT id, equipment_name, quantity, manufacturer, order_date, maintenance_date FROM baseball_equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC, order_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM baseball_equipment WHERE quantity > 5 AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, equipment_name, quantity FROM baseball_equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'Rawlings' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM baseball_equipment GROUP BY manufacturer HAVING total_count > 1
SELECT id, equipment_name, manufacturer FROM baseball_equipment WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY manufacturer, order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, location FROM equipment_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT technician_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, location FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, location FROM equipment_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse'
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_description FROM equipment_inventory INNER JOIN maintenance_records ON equipment_inventory.equipment_id = maintenance_records.equipment_id
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, location FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity < 5 OR location = 'Workshop' ORDER BY quantity DESC, location
SELECT * FROM monitoring_equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM monitoring_equipment_inventory WHERE location='Warehouse';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity, location FROM monitoring_equipment_inventory ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT order_id, equipment_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM monitoring_equipment_inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' AND quantity < 5;
SELECT equipment_name, order_date FROM monitoring_equipment_inventory JOIN orders ON monitoring_equipment_inventory.equipment_id = orders.equipment_id ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_description FROM monitoring_equipment_inventory JOIN maintenance_records ON monitoring_equipment_inventory.equipment_id = maintenance_records.equipment_id WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance_records FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_description LIKE '%fault%';
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, location, quantity FROM inventory WHERE location='Warehouse';
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM inventory;
SELECT order_id, order_date, status FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT description, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_records WHERE equipment_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM equipment_management WHERE usage_status = 'Active' AND next_maintenance_date <= DATE(NOW());
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, location FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE region = 'East';
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY equipment_name DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT equipment_name, COUNT(*) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY equipment_name
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE status = 'Pending'
SELECT equipment_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY equipment_name
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
